group.swac_coll_authors: Bernadette Perrin-Riou, Csilla Ducrocq, Mary Maury
group.swac_coll_desc: Cette collection est essentiellement destinée aux personnes étudiant l'anglais comme langue étrangère ainsi qu'à la production de matériel pédagogique.

tag.swac_text: Would you prefer excellent pay or job satisfaction?
If we make an offer
What are some of your strengths?
What are some of your weaknesses?
Which courses that you took will contribute the most to your effective performance in this job?
Can you tell me what the major sources of conflict in organisations are.
Do you work well under pressure?
How do you define success?
Tell me how you handled an ethical dilemma.
What have you learned from your extracurricular activities?
What qualities make for a good boss?
Why do you want to work for us?
Why should I hire you?
What are the three most common weaknesses of managers and supervisors?
What experience have you had in writing technical materials?
What do you think your salary will be in five years?
Do you have plans for additional education?
What do you think it takes to be successful in our company?
How would a supervisor evaluate an administrative employee's performance?
What subject did you dislike and why?
Why is feedback important?
How will your degree help you succeed in the job that you are interviewing for?
What is your proudest accomplishment?
Why did you choose the college that you attended?
Can you describe the ideal supervisor-subordinate relationship?
Is there anything you would like to say to close the interview?
Tell me your specific qualifications that make you the best candidate for this job
Why did you select the major that you selected?
Can you tell me how you completed all your work at a time your course load was very heavy.
Can you tell us what quality that you possess is the most outstanding.
Can you name the situations in which a supervisor should use a direct order.
What are your salary expectations?
What rewards do you expect from your career?
I wonder if you can describe the process by which conflict in an organisation should be addressed.
What are some examples of activities and surroundings that motivate you?
Can you say how employees may be recognized for excellent performance.
How should an assignment be made to an employee?
Are you a leader or a follower?
What steps can a superviser take to improve the capabilities of staff?
Can you tell us about your experience in developing technical materials.
Are you interested in promotional opportunities?
Tell me what you know about this organisation.
What are your career goals for the next 5 years?
How do you make yourself indispensable to a company?
What are the characteristics of an effective supervisor?
Tell me about a time when you had to resolve a problem with no rules or guidelines in place.
What is your personal life situation?
What do you like the most about the career that you're seeking?
How has your education prepared you for this position?
What aspects of your education will assist you in the job that you are seeking?
Will you accept part-time employment or job sharing? Explain why or why not.
What achievement in your life are you the most proud of?
What was the single most important lesson that you have learned in school?
What are your long-range career objectives ?
How will you achieve your long-range career objectives ?
How did you like your last job and why did you leave?
How can you contribute to our organisation?
How would your best friend describe you?
What subject was your favorite and why?
If you were hiring a person for this position, what qualities would you look for in an applicant?
If you could live 10 years over again
How did you get along with your former boss and co-workers?
I wonder if you could tell us about a challenging technical problem that you've come accross and how you addressed it.
Tell me about a time when you had to accomplish a task with someone who was particularly difficult to get along with.
Why did you choose this career?
How do you work with others?
What do you like the least about the career that you're seeking?
Aren't you a little young for this position?
